https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Bandhu Balaga is a 2008 Kannada film directed by Naganna and produced by Soorappa Babu and Kamalakar. The film stars Shivaraj Kumar, Poonam Kaur, Tejaswini and Shashikumar in lead roles. Music was composed by Hamsalekha. Bandhu Balaga
